lessons.title: TCPA: Robocall Rights
lessons.desc: Every robocall to your cell is worth $500–$1,500 in damages. Here's how to collect.

lessons.title: Unclaimed Property
lessons.desc: Billions in forgotten accounts. Your name might be in the national database right now.

lessons.title: FOIA: Access Government Records
lessons.desc: Your right to see what the government knows. How to file, what to expect.

lessons.title: Debt Collector Rights (FDCPA)
lessons.desc: Collectors can't call before 8am or after 9pm. Each violation = up to $1,000.

lessons.title: Free Digital Infrastructure
lessons.desc: Everything you need to run a full web presence for exactly $0/month.

lessons.title: Dispute a Credit Report Error
lessons.desc: 1 in 5 reports has errors. Fixing one can save thousands in interest. Here's how.

lessons.title: Win in Small Claims Court
lessons.desc: Sue without a lawyer. $30–$100 filing fee. Up to $25,000 recovery. No attorney needed.

lessons.title: Negotiate Medical Bills
lessons.desc: The chargemaster rate is fake. The real price is 40–80% less. Here's how to ask.

lessons.title: Free or Almost-Free Medications
lessons.desc: Patient assistance programs exist for every major drug. Most people never apply.

lessons.title: Workers Rights Most Don't Know
lessons.desc: Salary discussion is protected. Non-competes are often illegal. Wage theft is recoverable.

lessons.title: What a Library Card Gets You
lessons.desc: $1,000+ in resources: ebooks, films, courses, databases, notary, printing. All free.

lessons.title: Free Tax Filing — Every Option
lessons.desc: TurboTax spends millions lobbying to keep this complicated. Here are the free options.

lessons.title: Benefits You Probably Qualify For
lessons.desc: Medicaid, SNAP, LIHEAP, Lifeline, and more. Apply for all of them.
